msbt.message: Island residents and visitors alike should feel free to use the bulletin board to communicate with each other, celebrate special events, and more.

Island Bulletin Board
We'll use this board to post important notices and other useful bits of information for everyone, yes, yes!

Renovation Notice
Thanks to your support, we're going to remodel the shop! It will be closed so we can carry out renovations.

Shop Remodel Notice
Nook's Cranny is open for business again! Our remodel gives us more space for more goods, so stop by and check out our updated shop!
